names.Name: Power is out; there are no lights inside
The store is in construction; planks and tools are everywhere
Ooze is falling from the ceiling
Police tape bars the entrance
The store has inappropriate holiday decorations
The store is empty, no objects are found inside
A phone is ringing inside; the Friend is calling
There's a caterpillar colony invasion on the ceiling
A miniature train runs on the walls
The store is much too small
There's a jingle on a loop inside
There are Mall banknotes everywhere
The store is closed for fumigation
The store is inside an elevator
The store is much bigger on the inside
Every word inside is in a foreign language
Pipes are leaking inside the store
A wall has crumbled, the next store is visible
The store seems made from stone
There are cameras with eyes on the walls
The walls are mirrors
The floor is sticky
A big sale is going on
The store is squatted by hobos
The store has recently replaced another store
There is a stained glass storefront
There are growling, fur walls
The neons blink in Morse code
Everything in the store is green colored
There's a very low ceiling
The clerk is absorbed by a loud TV program
The clerk can't put down the magazine they're reading
A fussy customer is demanding to see the manager
The clerk is out from behind the counter cleaning up a huge mess
The clerk is on a lunch or smoke break, ignoring all customers
The clerk is on the phone with someone, creating a long line
An android of one of the PCs is shopping in the store and introduces itself as <PCNAME>2.0
A crude robot version of one of the PCs rests forlornly in a corner of the store, its likeness almost insulting, like a caricature
An almost perfect clone of a random PC whose memories diverge a few plazas back
Someone dressed in the same clothing as a random PC, even uses their body language and vocal mannerisms, studying their role
Dead body of a random PC, missing 2 inventory items but has a random Odd Object
Opposite clone of a random PC, not necessarily evil but a jock instead of a nerd, for example
The store is squatted by Free From Green!
The store is squatted by Mannequins for Freedom
The store is squatted by Collectors
The store is squatted by the Council of Objects
Clerks and clients are ghosts with limited dialogue
The furniture and people are made of flat cardboard, like a theater setting
